Uses of Interface
org.flywaydb.core.api.configuration.ConfigurationAware

  • Packages that use ConfigurationAware 
    Package Description
    org.flywaydb.core.api.callback
    Interfaces for Flyway lifecycle callbacks.
    org.flywaydb.core.api.migration.jdbc
    Interfaces for Jdbc Migrations.
    org.flywaydb.core.api.migration.spring
    Interfaces for Spring Jdbc Migrations (require Spring Jdbc + dependencies on the classpath).
    org.flywaydb.core.api.resolver
    Interfaces for Migration resolvers.

    • Uses of ConfigurationAware in org.flywaydb.core.api.callback

      Classes in org.flywaydb.core.api.callback that implement ConfigurationAware 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BaseFlywayCallback
      Deprecated. 
      Implement Callback instead. Will be removed in Flyway 6.0.

    • Uses of ConfigurationAware in org.flywaydb.core.api.migration.jdbc

      class  BaseJdbcMigration
      Convenience implementation if JdbcMigration.

    • Uses of ConfigurationAware in org.flywaydb.core.api.migration.spring

      Classes in org.flywaydb.core.api.migration.spring that implement ConfigurationAware 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BaseSpringJdbcMigration
      Convenience implementation if SpringJdbcMigration.

    • Uses of ConfigurationAware in org.flywaydb.core.api.resolver

      Classes in org.flywaydb.core.api.resolver that implement ConfigurationAware 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BaseMigrationResolver
      Base implementation of MigrationResolver that handles configuration injections by storing the configuration object in a field.
